ValidationRule.description: Block editing Date PO Expected on PSRO when not in "Preparation" and "In Execution" phases
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND ( $Profile.Name<>$Label.Data_Loader_Profile_Name, $Profile.Name<>$Label.System_Admin_Profile, ISCHANGED(PSR_Date_PO_Expected__c), NOT( ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Preparation') ) , NOT( ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'In Execution') ), NOT( ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Submitted For Approval') ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Date PO Expected / Contract Signed can only be edited in "Preparation" and "In Execution" phases.
